players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. We must vote her out today."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso, not me. Diana, we must vote Charlie out today."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Diana, trust me and vote Alice out."
You: "Charlie is lying. If he were detective, why investigate me? I investigated him and he's mafia. Diana, vote Charlie with me to win."
Diana: "I think Alice is the mafia. She lied about being the detective and tried to frame Charlie. We should vote her out."
